hero.title: Discover Catherine Sénéchal's latest artistic creations with InReal Art

eventInfo.title: InRealArt 2025 & Sénéchal Catalog

Where: Espace Bastille Design, 74 Boulevard Richard-Lenoir, 75011 Paris, France
Sunday 6 p.m. to 9 p.m. | Monday 7 p.m. to 9 p.m | Tuesday 2 p.m to 5 p.m

artist.title:
“Through my impressionism, I paint the memory of a changing world, to remind us that humanity and nature must remain at the heart of our values.”
Monique Laville
artist.text2: Monique Laville's vibrant canvases plunge to the heart of the ecological and humanist issues of our time. Influenced by the Impressionist movement, this self-taught artist from Marseilles depicts with unique sensitivity the disappearance of ancestral crafts, forgotten traditions and historic sites sacrificed to modernism. The recipient of numerous international distinctions - a member of the Academies of Rome and Quebec, i-CAC certified, and listed on Artprice - her works are an ode to collective memory and a call to reinvent a more humane future. To acquire one of Monique Laville's creations is to embrace a committed and timeless art form.

expert.name: Meulemans Catherine
expert.words: ”Monique Laville paints with the soul, transforming each canvas into a window onto a world where past and present intertwine. Inspired by Impressionism, she reinvents forgotten traditions, bygone trades and vanished landscapes, while denouncing the excesses of our modern society. Her works, charged with emotion and symbolism, capture the essence of collective memory and the fragility of humanity in the face of industrialization. To acquire one of Laville's creations is to embrace an art that speaks to the soul, between nostalgia, commitment and timeless beauty.”
expert.role: Head of Sales Founder Galerie Art Thema

whyChooseUS.title: Why choosing us ?
whyChooseUS.subTitle:
Explore a unique collection of physical paintings and rare sculpture,
their digital copies (NFT), accompanied by their copyrights.
whyChooseUS.cardText1:
With over 80 years of combined experience, our team selects less than 100 works by renowned artists, chosen for their uniqueness and their ability to enrich a collection.

Whether you're a novice or a seasoned collector, acquiring these rare pieces is a privilege, offering distinction and value to your collection.
whyChooseUS.cardText2:
Our marketplace innovates by integrating physical works, NFTs and fractional copyrights.

Thanks to blockchain, we ensure transparent and secure transactions transactions, guaranteeing the traceability of works. This approach enables collectors access to a unique and diverse art market.
whyChooseUS.cardText3:
Art is both a passion and an investment opportunity. Our platform enables you to diversify your portfolio with physical, digital and copyright works.rights.

The rarity of the pieces on offer offers potential for appreciation. Whether you're a novice or an expert, you're entering a market where art can become become a source of lasting value.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.artist1: “With InRealArt, I can take Pictural Reverism to the pinnacle of its art and pass on my heritage in a timeless way through these canvases. It's a unique opportunity to merge tradition and innovation, offering a new dimension to my work.“
testimonials.artist2: “Thanks to InRealArt, I can take my artistic vision and pop art to new horizons and share my innovative work with the whole world. It's a privilege to be part of this revolution, where each work transcends time and finds its place in the future of art.“
